CODIF_DATA.RP_REGULATION: European Union, with participation by GPA countries
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: 01C03

TI_TEXT.P: Архитектурни и свързани с тях услуги
Servicios de arquitectura y servicios conexos
Servizzi ta' l-arkitettura u dawk relatati
Dienstverlening op het gebied van architectuur en dergelijke
Servicii de arhitectură şi servicii conexe
Arhitekturne storitve in z njimi povezane storitve

TITLE.P: Single Operator Frameworks for Design Team Services for Maintenance / Refurbishment Projects

SHORT_DESCR.P: University of Limerick (UL) wishes to establish separate Single Operator Framework Agreements for Design Team Services associated with the design and construction of Maintenance / Refurbishment Projects for the University of Limerick. UL intends to use a single stage, open competition for the creation of the separate Single Operator Framework Agreements.
The design team services being procured as part of this process comprise the following principal services / disciplines:
Lot 6: Project Supervisor Design Process and Project Supervisor Construction Stage Services.

University of Limerick (UL) wishes to establish separate Single Operator Framework Agreements for Design Team Services associated with the design and construction of Maintenance / Refurbishment Projects for the University of Limerick. UL intends to use a single stage, open competition for the creation of the separate Single Operator Framework Agreements.
The design team services being procured as part of this process comprise the following principal services / disciplines:
Lot 6: Project Supervisor Design Process and Project Supervisor;

Applicants are being requested to complete the response to the Suitability Assessment Questionnaire (SAQ). In addition, applicants are being requested to submit a tender in accordance with the requirements set down in the Instructions to Tenderers, the Tender and Schedule and the Pricing Schedule.

Candidates included on the Single Operator Framework Agreements will be requested to submit a fixed price lump sum fee for projects to be undertaken as part of the Framework, in advance of carrying out the works. This lump sum fee will be calculated based on the number of hours required to complete the project and will be offset against the hours included in the Pricing Schedule.

The Contracting Authority may terminate this competition (or any part thereof), change the basis of and the procedures for the bidding process, at any time, or procure the contract by alternative means if it appears that it can thereby be more advantageously procured. The most economically advantageous or any tender will not necessarily be accepted.

It is currently the intention of UL that the Single Operator Framework Agreements the subject of this competition shall be completed on or after January 2018, although this is subject to change at the discretion of UL.

INFO_ADD.P: Frequency of contracts not known. Value of the maintenance works and minor works projects to be awarded under this framework will be to a maximum project value of 1 500 000 EUR.
